body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of George Bergen and Magdalena Voorhees Bergen. Married to Mary Jane Gibson Bergen in Shelby County, Kentucky, on March 23, 1843. Father of George W. Bergen, John S. Bergen, Annie R. Bergen, Albert N. Bergen, Joseph W. Bergen, Samuel Curtis Bergen, Robert G. Bergen, and Minnie W. Bergen. Farmer in Shelby County in 1850. Farmer in Shelby County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Shelby County in 1860.
